# Northern Kharkiv front of the Russo-Ukrainian war order of battle__disambig_1

This is the order of battle for the northern Kharkiv front of the Russo-Ukrainian War. Russian forces crossed the border with Ukraine north of the city of Kharkiv on 10 May 2024, opening a new front.
